title: Skarner jungle
body: Does anyone know how to counter Skarner jungle?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Rapunzel,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=O1ztKE46,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-02T23:27:31.767+0000)
>
> Does anyone know how to counter Skarner jungle?

yup - wards.
yea pretty much just don't fight him on his crystals or he will destroy you. I thin the best way is just to have vision, find out where he is and gank lanes he is not around.
Don't fight him in his crystals, be able to steal baron's/dragon's without fighting them.

invade him, dont gank lanes, gank skarner, take crystals
champs with huge early game strength like lee and elise
